data.title: Famous Birthdays on August 6
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 6th of August. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on August 6.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 239

Go-Toba, 82nd Emperor of Japan (1183-98), born in Heian-Kyo, Japan (d. 1239)

Italian singer, theorbo player, and composer, baptized in Venice, Republic of Venice
